SA01bsa039_u:2_0: kenacit sugatiprāptukāmena heyā daśākuśalakarmapathāḥ prakṛtisāvadyāḥ, tadyathā-
SA01bsa039_u:4_0: ete pravibhāgaśaḥ vyākhyāyante- tatra tāvat kāyikam-prāṇātipātaḥ,
SA01bsa039_u:4_1: adattādānam, kāmamithyācāraśceti / vācikam- mṛṣāvādaḥ, paiśunyam, pāruṣyam, saṃbhinnapralāpaśca / mānasañca- abhidhyā, vyāpādo, mithyādṛṣṭiśca / tatra prāṇātipātastu prāṇibhāvaḥ,
SA01bsa039_u:4_2: prāṇisaṃjñābhāvaḥ, vadhakacittopasthitiḥ, etadupāyakaraṇam, prāṇāvarodhabhāvaśceti etatpañcāṅgaiḥ saṃyukto bhavati prāṇātipātaḥ /
SA01bsa039_u:5_1: paraparigrahasaṃjñatvam ca, steyacittopasthitiḥ, tadupāyakaraṇam, sthānacyutiśca etatpañcāṅgasaṃyuktaṃ bhavatyadattādānam /
SA01bsa039_u:6_1: asthānam, akālaḥ, adeśaḥ, agamyaśceti / tatra asthānaṃ tu saddharma-pratimādi-bodhisattvasthānācāryopādhyāyadakṣiṇīya- mātā-pitṛ-gurvādisaṃnidhiḥ /
SA01bsa039_u:6_6: rājarakṣitāḥ, paraparigṛhītā veśyāḥ, sambandhinyaḥ, tiraścyaśca / evaṃ svabhāryāsevane 'pi bhavati kāmamithyācāraḥ /
SA01bsa039_u:7_1: vastusthiticyutiḥ, mithyāsaṃjñābhāvaḥ, mithyopāyopasthitiśca, tadupāyakaraṇanceti mithyāvacanoktiśca ityetat pañcāṅgasaṃyoge mṛṣāvādaḥ /
SA01bsa039_u:9_0_0: mithyādṛṣṭiriti nāsti dānam, na yajñaṃ, nehalokaḥ, na paralokaḥ, na śramaṇaḥ, na
SA01bsa039_u:9_0_1: brāhmaṇaḥ, na devaḥ, na buddho bhagavān, na arhan, na pratyekabuddhaḥ, na sucaritam
SA01bsa039_u:10_0: bhagavatā ukte 'āryasaddharmasmṛtyupasthāne' mahāyānasūtre ca nirdiṣṭo daśākuśalakarmapatho 'yaṃ tu mahānarakahetuḥ /
SA01bsa039_u:12_0: tenaiva bhāratīyopādhyāyena mahāsaṃśodhakalokakṣuṣā bhikṣu-jayaśīlena cānūditaḥ sampāditaśca //
